text: I had the privilege of practicing medicine in the early '60s, before we had any government. It worked rather well, and there was nobody on the street suffering with no medical care.
author: Ron Paul

text: If you're so pro-life, do me a favour: don't lock arms and block medical clinics. If you're so pro-life, lock arms and block cemeteries.
author: Bill Hicks

text: Whenever the people are for gay marriage or medical marijuana or assisted suicide, suddenly the 'will of the people' goes out the window.
author: Bill Maher

text: The rich man's dog gets more in the way of vaccination, medicine and medical care than do the workers upon whom the rich man's wealth is built.
author: Samora Machel

text: Vaccination is the medical sacrament corresponding to baptism. Whether it is or is not more efficacious I do not know.
author: Samuel Butler
